first

Class Affichage

  • java.lang.Object
    • first.Affichage

  • public class Affichage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is showing in the console the grid for the mine-sweeper, Its main goal is to show the console interaction with the user. It's showing questions about how the game will evolve and it transmits messages.
    Author:
    Group 14 -2TL2

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Goal - putting the program together.

        It creates a new scanner which will asks for different choices of the user.

        One the choices are clear it calls the constructors of the other classes.

        If the choice is not well written an error message will appear.

        At the end of game the scanner is closed.

      • devoilement

        public static boolean devoilement(Tableau aff,
                                  Tableau tab,
                                  java.util.Scanner sc)
        Goal - ask the user to put a flag or to do an action to a specific box of the grid
        Parameters:
        aff - - it receives the coordinates from the scanner and it shows in the console to the user

        If the user chooses a flag than in the console and the given coordinates it will show ^

        tab - - it receives the coordinates from the scanner and it checks the mother table for the data
        sc - - the answer has to be written in the exact same form as in the question
        sc - - the case number have to be one number which exists in the grid
        Returns:
        true if it is a bomb

      • isAllFound

        public static boolean isAllFound(Tableau aff,
                                 Tableau tab)
        Goal - recover the full number of bombs from the mother table which is hidden. Check the maximum number of available boxes. Verifies that the number of the unveiled boxes is equal to the number of possible boxes, and if it is the case the game is won.
        Parameters:
        aff -
        tab -
        Returns:
        true and the game ends - you win
